channel.title: Getting-starteds on QuantumPT Official Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Getting-starteds on QuantumPT Official Documentation

item.title: Getting started
item.description: Getting started The simplest way to navigate the documentation is to use the Next and Previous arrows (< >) on each page.

item.title: What is QuantumPT ?
item.description: QuantumPT (QuantumPrayerTimes) is an application developped from scratch using PyQt5 and Python 3. Why QuantumPT ? This application is aimed to provide an offline (without internet connexion) prayer times calculator and reminders (Athans). Multiple applications exist with the same purpose so why developing another one ? I wanted to create a complete free, open-source, fully portable and good looking application. Why 90% of the muslim desktop applications always looks like old application based on Windows XP (even Windows 2000) skin-like.

item.title: Requirements
item.description: The application has been tested on Windows 7 only but it is expected to work on Windows 8, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10. Windows The application should work without any dependencies, tested on a fresh Windows 7 installation. You may need to run the application with administrator privileges. Windows 7 (x64 or x86) (optional) vcredist Linux Not yet developed.. Mac Not yet developed..

item.title: Installation
item.description: Windows Run the installer and follow the instructions, it is pretty straight forward. A detailed tutorial will be available soon..

item.title: First time configuration
item.description: When running the first time the application, you will have to configure it. For this purpose, a wizard is runned. Step 1 At this point the location should be automatically determined. If you are satisfied with the location, you can press Nextand skip to Step 3. If you think that the location is incorrect, you can continue with Step 2. Step 2 First, if the problem comes from you internet connection, you can retry to reconnect in order to retrive the location from internet.

item.title: Getting Help
item.description: Report bugs or ask a question If you encounter a bug or an issue, you can send an email to quantumprayertimes@gmail.com For developers only, you can use GitHub to submit an issue or a pull request Please, make sure to mention the context of the issue and the steps needed to reproduce the bug ! Pull requests For developers, you can use GitHub to submit a pull request
